message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Could you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer. I'll sell the product to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Could you consider that?
I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you halfway between $115 and $108. I'll sell the product to you for $111.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $109. Could you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $112.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $112 and my original target of $105. I'll offer $107.50. Could you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $113.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'll make one final offer. I'll pay $110. That's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're willing to sell at that price, I'll take the deal.
